adDetails: Are you looking for a male personal attendant/caregiver for an aging parent or a spouse? Or maybe you are recovering from an illness and need some help? I am available to come to your home in Marin County and help you with the following: Grocery shopping Meal preparation Light housekeeping Transportation to and from appointments or activities Walks I live in Marin County, I have a clean driving record and car insurance, a clean background check, and I have worked for many clients in Marin County. I am a kind, caring, and responsible male. I am also reliable, punctual, and take pride in caring for people. I am physically fit and can take clients to appointments, run errands, go on walks, and I am a great companion/conversationalist. I have the flexibility to work 1 day or several days a week for you along with some overnight shifts if necessary. I do require a minimum 4 hour shift. Please reply to this ad and let me know what you are looking for and your phone number. I look forward to hearing from you. John
